summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Fifteenth Avenue Northwest, in the City of Seattle, from West Seventy-fifth Street to West Eighty-fifth Street, by constructing water mains therein, together with all gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 1529 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
